name: The myterious fortune teller
mes:
Gira is a wandering hero in a new town who has just taken out a group of bandits. He goes around the city, looking for the guild. He had heard rumors about bad things happening in the town and didn't wish to stay around, unless there was an opportunity to make money that is. It had been a time for Gira and many things were on his mind. Saving princesses, defeating the demon queen, getting enough money... at least he could work things out one step at a time.

"Greetings young traveler" *the mysterious girl said*. "I sense you need some help on your journeys. Come. Tell me what you know, and I shall help you..."

name: The myterious fortune teller
mes:
The mysterious fortune teller leaned forward, the mask on her face gleaming under the soft light of the candles. Her white curtain bangs swayed with her gentle movements. "Greetings young traveler," she said, her voice tinged with a thick Slavic accent. "I sense you need some help on your journeys. Come. Tell me what you know, and I shall help you..."

Behind her table was a strange assortment of items: candles with flickering flames, wooden signs inscribed with an enigmatic language, and other shaman-like objects. Gira could barely make out the details through the blue tattered cloth covering the table, casting shadows across the odd paraphernalia.

Unbeknownst to Gira, her slender feet, covered in a slimy aphrodisiac lubricant, were concealed under the tablecloth. They were ready, poised to unzip his pants and gain access to his cock at the first opportunity. The woman's intoxicating presence was already beginning to cloud his senses as she gestured towards the purple crystal ball on the table that emitted a beautiful purple spiral.

"Come closer," she invited with an enticing tone, her hand beckoning him forward. "Tell me your heart's deepest desires, and let me guide you to your destiny."
